definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Professor Jardine is a committed socialist.
sentences.chinese: 賈丁教授是堅定的社會主義者。

sentences.english: F.D.R. was called a lot worse names than socialist.
sentences.chinese: 羅斯福因此被稱作是比社會主義者還“惡劣”的人。

sentences.english: Socialists today might well sympathise with the sentiment.
sentences.chinese: 今天的社會主義者對此也許頗能引起共鳴。

sentences.english: Marx and Engels were the first socialists to support trade unions.
sentences.chinese: 率先支持工會運動的社會主義者也是馬克思和恩格斯。

sentences.english: He avowed himself (to be) a socialist.
sentences.chinese: 他公開宣稱自己是個社會主義者。

sentences.english: John McCain, in return, denounced him as a socialist, a redistributor.
sentences.chinese: 麥凱恩則指責他是想要進行財富再分配的社會主義者。

sentences.english: Mr McCain has tried to portray Barack Obama as an unpatriotic socialist.
sentences.chinese: 麥凱恩努力將奧巴馬描述成一個不愛國的社會主義者。

sentences.english: The Commune has been mythologized by socialists and revolutionaries ever since.
sentences.chinese: 已被神化了公社的社會主義者和革命者至今。

sentences.english: And, he says, it produces ignorance of what socialists think these days.
sentences.chinese: 他還說，這也造成了現在人們忽視社會主義者的看法。

sentences.english: To some, that may sound socialist, but it need not be.
sentences.chinese: 這聽起來像，卻不必然是社會主義者的言論。

sentences.english: No socialist has ever been able to provide an answer to Mises's devastating point.
sentences.chinese: 沒有哪一個社會主義者能夠迴應米塞斯的致命一擊。

sentences.english: Maybe we'll all be socialists after all.
sentences.chinese: 或許，我們終究都會成爲社會主義者。

sentences.english: The real utopians were the socialists before Marx.
sentences.chinese: 真正的烏托邦分子，是馬克思以前的那些社會主義者。
